com.jdroid.android.fragment

Class AbstractSearchFragment<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.jdroid.android.fragment.AbstractFragment
        • com.jdroid.android.fragment.AbstractGridFragment<T>
          • com.jdroid.android.fragment.AbstractPaginatedGridFragment<T>
            • com.jdroid.android.fragment.AbstractSearchFragment<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - An item in the list.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.support.v4.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout.OnRefreshListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, ComponentIf, FragmentIf, OnItemSelectedListener<T>, DefaultUseCaseListener

    public abstract class AbstractSearchFragment<T>
extends AbstractPaginatedGridFragment<T>
    Base search Fragment. It has a search text and a list with the results.

        public boolean enoughToFilter()
        Returns:
        true if the amount of text in the field meets or exceeds the getThreshold() requirement. You can override this to impose a different standard for when filtering will be triggered.
